mapper.sql:
SELECT q.*, CASE WHEN u.user_type = 'admin' THEN COALESCE(tu.real_name, u.real_name) WHEN u.user_type = 'student' THEN COALESCE(bs.real_name, u.real_name) ELSE u.real_name END AS uploader FROM biz_question q LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id = q.creator_id LEFT JOIN biz_student bs ON bs.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN biz_subject s ON s.name COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci = q.subject COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci LEFT JOIN ( SELECT subject_id, MIN(teacher_id) AS teacher_id FROM biz_teacher_subject_map GROUP BY subject_id ) tsm ON tsm.subject_id = s.id LEFT JOIN biz_teacher bt ON bt.id = tsm.teacher_id LEFT JOIN users tu ON tu.id = bt.user_id
LEFT JOIN biz_question_type qt ON qt.type_id = q.type_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_question (type_id, content, options, answer, analysis, difficulty, subject, knowledge_points, file_id, creator_id, status) VALUES (#{typeId}, #{content}, #{options}, #{answer}, #{analysis}, #{difficulty}, #{subject}, #{knowledgePoints}, #{fileId}, #{creatorId}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_question SET type_id = #{typeId}, content = #{content}, options = #{options}, answer = #{answer}, analysis = #{analysis}, difficulty = #{difficulty}, subject = #{subject}, knowledge_points = #{knowledgePoints}, file_id = #{fileId}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT q.*, CASE WHEN u.user_type = 'admin' THEN COALESCE(tu.real_name, u.real_name) WHEN u.user_type = 'student' THEN COALESCE(bs.real_name, u.real_name) ELSE u.real_name END AS uploader FROM biz_question q LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id = q.creator_id LEFT JOIN biz_student bs ON bs.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN biz_subject s ON s.name COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci = q.subject COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci LEFT JOIN ( SELECT subject_id, MIN(teacher_id) AS teacher_id FROM biz_teacher_subject_map GROUP BY subject_id ) tsm ON tsm.subject_id = s.id LEFT JOIN biz_teacher bt ON bt.id = tsm.teacher_id LEFT JOIN users tu ON tu.id = bt.user_id WHERE q.id = #{id}

SELECT q.*, CASE WHEN u.user_type = 'admin' THEN COALESCE(tu.real_name, u.real_name) WHEN u.user_type = 'student' THEN COALESCE(bs.real_name, u.real_name) ELSE u.real_name END AS uploader FROM biz_question q LEFT JOIN biz_question_type t ON t.type_id = q.type_id LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id = q.creator_id LEFT JOIN biz_student bs ON bs.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN biz_subject s ON s.name COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci = q.subject COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci LEFT JOIN ( SELECT subject_id, MIN(teacher_id) AS teacher_id FROM biz_teacher_subject_map GROUP BY subject_id ) tsm ON tsm.subject_id = s.id LEFT JOIN biz_teacher bt ON bt.id = tsm.teacher_id LEFT JOIN users tu ON tu.id = bt.user_id
AND t.type_code = #{typeCode} AND q.subject = #{subject} AND q.status = 1
ORDER BY q.create_time DESC
